content: I'm a software engineer, specifically a backend developer, and I've been in this field since I graduated with a degree in Computer Science from the University of California, Berkeley. I've been working at NovaTech for about 4 years and 3 months now. Given my experience, I'm looking for a tool that's easy to use and can provide detailed insights into our API's performance. I've heard of New Relic and Datadog, but I'm not sure which one would be the best fit for our team. Can you give me a brief comparison of these two tools?
